properties.markdownProperty:
`plugins` package and all the plugins packages must be added as 'hiddenimports' since they are imported using `importlib`. Example of the `spec` file (note how `remus` and `basics` plugins are also added):
``` a = Analysis( ['proteus\\__main__.py'], pathex=[], binaries=[], datas=[('proteus.ini', '.')], hiddenimports=['proteus.plugins', 'proteus.plugins.basics', 'proteus.plugins.remus'], hookspath=[], hooksconfig={}, runtime_hooks=[], excludes=[], noarchive=False, ) ... ```
